name: Data Collecting System
description:
Data transfer From filling scales to PC
Version: for carousel design
Signal transmission: through the built-in terminal transmitter to the RS232
receiver wirelessly via radio, 100m max * (depending on
environment). Over 100m range is optional
Installation: in accordance with drawing no 240.14361.001
The receiver is connected with PC by means of a cable.
(The length of the cable max. 5m)
With the help of the delivered software the filling data can be evaluated,
processed, printed or saved.
The set consists of:
- 1 modern computer (2011 year issue)
- mark non coloured printer;
- 1 x bi-direction evaluation software pack for data processing from filling
carousel installed and on CD;
- 1 x RF data receiver, incl. power supply;
- 2 x antenna with cable;
- 1 x adapter USB2.0 to RS232 with USB cable;
- 1 x RS232 cable (serial)
- switches and signal converter (optional, if over 100m)
- 1 x manual in EN, DE, RU on CD
